name: Secret Santa 2020
description:
!Please note that to support this games unique movement, a controller is required to play!

Take control of an angel-in-practice and fly around three fast-paced level in a chase to reach a new high score! 

With unique flying mechanics and a solid combo system you're sure to find great fun!

Please post your high score in this twitter thread, maybe you can even beat me :D

https://twitter.com/Mr__KitKat/status/1341443406954950657?s=20
